QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT distinct a.admphy_spec, max(a.prov_id) as care_site_id, a.admphy_spec as provider_source_value, MAX(b.admphy_spec_desc) as speciality_source_value FROM [pat] a join admspec b on a.admphy_spec = b.admphy_spec group by a.admphy_spec union select 900, 57824101, '900', 'Unknown Physician'
